name: hibiki
description: Hibiki (響) – Discord audio companion bot with a Vue-based control surface.

scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/bot && npm run lint -w apps/web
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev -w apps/bot" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run copy:web && npm run build -w apps/bot
